contribution_desc:
Middleware for smart home interconnected devices.
Allows cross-device interaction with proxies (though different use of cross-device, as a quite generic term), and uses DOM inspection and some other techniques for interoperability.
devices_included: Smart home; Printer; ; Desktop computer; Laptop; TV
evaluation: Technical evaluation (e.g., runtime, roundtrip); Technical performance (speed)
crossdevice_def: Different use of cross-device, as a quite generic term
